item.title: Renters unions
item.description: Overview Renters unions seek to providers a similar space to trade unions, organising based on someone’s position as a renter rather than their employment.

item.title: Resistance
item.description: Damp conditions are resisted on a daily basis. These acts of resistance can seem small in scale (a complaint, talking to a neighbour), or larger (unionising, joining a campaign, working with your residents association).
